I regret to say that my experience at has not been positive. While the school places a heavy emphasis on its external image, it seems to overlook the more important aspects of education and student support. A significant portion of the school’s resources appears to be allocated toward organizing trips for certain students, which leaves the quality of academic instruction and the overall learning environment lacking.

In addition, frequent and often unnecessary changes to classes have caused confusion and frustration. This has made it difficult to maintain a consistent and focused learning experience. I also feel that the school does not prioritize creating a sense of community, as class compositions are frequently altered, making it harder to form meaningful connections with peers. It would be more beneficial for students to have classes with familiar faces, rather than being constantly mixed with different groups.

The layout of the school could also be improved. The distance between subjects often requires long walks across campus, which wastes valuable time and adds unnecessary stress to the school day.

Overall, I do not believe that this school can provide the supportive and enriching environment that students need. I would not highly recommend this school to others, as it seems to prioritize appearances over substance and student well-being.
